imdb_user_reviews.contents: It seems critics are missing the point.
May Not Be For Everyone, But It Was DEFINITELY For Me!
Excellent premise requires suspension of beliefs though
pretty intense and definitely worth seeing
Pay very close attention - it is worth it!
Repo Men Gets a Bad Rep
Gory sci-fi with an obvious message
A real sci fi experience into a world of human bionics.
A nonsensical world and a botched attempt at social commentary.
Sandbox Film Experiment With Many Borrowed Film Scenes
a fantastic premise, and an up-for-it cast... and a little too familiar all at once
The most shocking, twisted ending since 'The Descent'. The IMDb Star rating does not do this movie justice.
an interesting idea for a movie
Started as a good film, ended as a waste of time
Disappointing, unpleasant, and some Ole' BS
Sci-fi noir at its best until it took the wrong turn
Tries too hard without any proper thought
Relevant, action packed story with interesting commentary.
A gruelling action film set in a future where those who can't pay for their artificial organs have them removed
Too far fetched and gory for my liking.
Law and Whitaker, men of action, in one electrically charged ride
An entertaining if formulaic sci-fi action film
Liked this, after the twist came into play
Shows how evil actions are typically justified
One of the few decent sci-fi's of the 2000's
A job is a job... Until it becomes personal
one of many bad consequences of so called privatisation
Gaudy and Overcooked with Little Substance
Ambitious, but Too complex, while trying too hard too accomplish everything all in one setting.
A sci-fi movie that remembers what the whole point of sci-fi was in the first place
a very violent sci-fi film without too many plot holes
Predictable......but still popcorn fun to watch on a dark night.
Beware: They are not your average Repo Men!
This Review Comes from a Die-Hard Science Fiction Fan
Not-bad concept becomes masochistic excuse for gore and violence
Blood Spilling with no sense in the story..
Surprising and unexpectedly different - notice I didn't say "Good" though...
This movie rubbed me the wrong way... But it was f****** intelligent and very well made.
"  Welcome Repo-Man, to the world you created and sustained "
Moderately entertaining, but it could have been better
Decent action flick with a  good story
Repo Men doesn't deliver what it promises
Gruesome, Gory and  really not enjoyable
Unequal and searching for a heart.
Not bad but I've seen much better!
So bad it is actually funny...
Will stay with me for a while
Not perfect, but I've watched much worse.
Good, But Not Good Enough To Recommend
Please Repo This Movie From The Theaters
I'll give it 9 stars, it's a good action flick
The movie that tried too hard...
Some terrific stuff completely trashed by absurd and clumsy directing...
An above-average, entertaining sci-fi action flick
Good action, pretty gory, definitely worth the watch.
Repo Men entertaining but not original
a great movie that ends badly.
I gave this movie an 8 because it simply is not a B movie, and the spoilers contained are vague enough
Interesting premise; some bright spots; great music; hated the ending
Liked it, could have been a lot better.
Either love or hate it: Brasil meets Existenz
Reheated Philip K.Dick ; scattershot at best but still bloody good sci-fi suspenser
Horrible copy of a great thing,
Bloody, Violent, Sardonic Saga About Transplanting Artificial Body Parts In The Future
Why was this movie made?? What does it want to tell us??
A Disgustingly violent pointless film with a plot full of holes.
much better then IMDb rating of 6.4
They're coming to get (some of) you ...
Not that bad, not great, but beat my expectations
Loved it! But a few annoyances
Repo! the Genetic Opera and Repo Men: both the same, both different, both worth your time!
A Misunderstood Gem in the Rough!
'Repo Men' is a rough mixture of sci-fi organ parts
Beware.  The IMDBers are overrating another stinker
science fiction at it's creepy best
Left me feeling very hollow - major spoiler alert...
I really didn't find this movie to be as bad as a lot of other reviews I read indicated.
A great sci-fi thriller, gives a new meaning to health care reform and the future
sci-fi near future brainless hollywoodish medical slasher-porn
A plot this interesting shouldn't become a disappointment.
When you look past the mediorce script and the over-whelming amount of action scenes, this isn't so bad
Repo the Genetic Opera is a breath of fresh air in a stale world of Horror movie copy cats

mc_user_reviews.text: I saw Repo Men today. It was an entertaining film, that was extremely violent and had an interesting premise and story. The cast was good, but the predictability of the plot and the adrupt ending left something to be desired. Still, it was good. A 7.5/10.

Good first thirty minutes, but turns dull soon after. The setting is futuristic, but it seems like deja vu because you've seen the same futuristic city scape too many times before. The film is too dark, and the action is average. Oh yes, let's not forget about Jude Law. What can I say, a role that seemed to fit perfectly with the film, but the film didn't fit perfectly with him. If you have money to spare, see it. Although, you'll be forgetting about it soon after.
i watched the movie yesterday and it was pretty good!! and trust me i've seen a lot of movies in my life!! a lot of people are hating the movie because of the ending!!? grow up!!

Pornographic gore from excellent cast.  Why did they agree to do this?  Great premise wasted on hyperbolic direction.  We wish for the camera to cut away every time Jude Law thrusts his hands inside another living creature.  Save me from this nightmare.
A Film Review by: Sam Fragoso

It's shocking how this film was ruined so much by a pathetic excuse for an ending. It was a little slow at times but overall the film wasn't too bad, but to end it in such a sloppy way is just unforgivable. Change the ending and you have yourself an OK thriller.
Not a good movie, but an interesting ending. I was sad for the protagonist, but it would have been a ridiculous if everything just happened to go so well for him.
I really enjoyed this film.  People seem to be taking this film far too seriously.  An interesting future concept which held together some unexpected action sequences.
They would have done a much better job then they did  on this.  They should have been repoing cars or other cool stuff.. not  body parts1.. come on that was wack  Jay

The only good thing about this movie is its premise. OH WAIT Repo! The Genetic Opera got there first. The premise sure was original when Repo! first used it. I guess someone thought it would be a good idea to take all the music and enjoyment out of Repo! and replace it with failure.
Seen so many bad movies, this one doesn't reserve such bad critics, think most bad critics are because of its argued disregard for life maybe.

Very similar themes and twists to Logan's Run, Equilibrium, Minority Report (men carrying out morally questionable jobs discover the error of their ways). The excessive & needless blood-letting seems to have alienated reviewers. Look beyond it and it's well performed, reasonably enjoyable, and with the best ending  of this brand of movie.

For me, it is a good stylish old-fashioned Sci-fi movie, looks like Total Recall (Total Recall is also a gore one, isn't it?). Sometimes funny, a little bit of references, cool music. As much of gore as we used to see and as exist in any medical profession.
This movie isn't that bad. I mean okay it's doesn't really have the greatest dialog ever, but this movie has some great action sequences and a very shocking ending.

This movie is one of those good underrated movies. Do not listen to the critics on this one, they're very often wrong. The movie was one of the best action movies of 2010. The story was very interesting, and it carried all the way to the end. I really wasn't expecting anything from this movie when I bought it, but now I think I'm even gonna read the book.
Although Repo Men is quite predictable and cliche, it's gory and entertaining, and it even has some funny moments in it as well.

This movie was more than just decent. From all the negative reviews I've heard about it in the past I had ignored this movie for so long, which I now regret after finally watching the movie. I rated this movie so highly because I felt I needed to average out all of the horrible scores/reviews the movie received, when in actuality I feel like this movie was just misunderstood by too many.

A solid sci-fi action film with a pretty cool premise. Jude Law and Forest Whitaker work pretty well together in buddy cop sort of way, Liev Schreiber also does well. The story though is pretty generic and the ending will both surprise and irritate.

TLDR: Repo Men is a sci-fi thriller about the dangers of treating peoples lives, health and well-being become a commodity. It deals with ethics and morality, and while it never reaches the great heights, it is a solid movie with a surprise twist.

Trop long, le film s'en sort à grand'peine par son cynisme sur la sécurité sociale du grand futur où les organes artificiels sont devenus un abominable bizness de gros bâtards de multinationales usurières. Le côté dystopique est ainsi bien rendu puisque dans le cas où la dernière hypothèque de la baraque ne suffit plus à payer les traites du nouveau coeur, les "repo men" viennent prendre repossession de l'organe impayé : cruel mais juste...
